bioAsHtml: Koen Aben is an experienced Grails software engineer. He has worked as a Java consultant for 10 years. He is an Open Source developer on several Grails projects. He loves to give software engineering trainings and promote software craftsmanship. He has founded the hackerspace in Eindhoven, where technolgy experts in Eindhoven can meet every week.
